header.title: Protect {{FileFormatUp}} with Digital Certificates via {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Safeguard the content of your business documents by sealing them with digital certificates using the features of {{ProdFullName}}. We provide multiple ways to mark and secure your documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive signing solution that supports various types of document processing. You can add text, images, digital certificates, and stamps to files in 60+ formats, including PDF, MS Office, images, ZIP files, and other popular business formats. Additionally, signed documents can be searched, verified, modified, or deleted automatically in a convenient way.

more_features.title: Enhance or Protect Document Content with Signatures
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} library is capable of signing all popular file formats. Add, modify, verify, or delete various types of signatures automatically to streamline your business processes.

feature_1.title: Add Signatures to Documents
feature_1.content: Text, Image, Barcode, QR-Code, or Stamp signatures can be precisely added to any page of any supported document. Hidden metadata like EXIF can be added or edited in images and most file types. Protect document content from unauthorized changes using digital signatures.

feature_2.title: Signature Search and Verification
feature_2.content: Documents can be processed in various ways after signing. Verify signed documents to ensure they have been processed properly. If you need more control, retrieve a list of all signatures through search.

feature_3.title: Edit Signatures
feature_3.content: Most types of signatures support further modification. You are free to correct text, change position, color, size, and more.

feature_4.title: Remove Unnecessary Signatures
feature_4.content: Our solution supports full CRUD operations for signatures. Many types of signatures, including digital certificates, can be deleted from a document when necessary.

formats.title: Sign Documents in Other Formats
formats.description: The {{EnvName}} API allows you to process more than 60 formats. Create and add various signatures to any page, seal content with digital certificates, and manage and edit existing signatures within the document.

operations.title: Examine Our Comprehensive Feature Set
operations.description: We take pride in the extensive functionality and signature support our platform offers
